mapper.select: select id,nickname,`group`,username,password,is_close,type,is_read,remark from t_admin where username = #{username} and is_read = 0

select id,nickname,`group`,username,password,remark,is_read from t_admin where id != 1 and id!= #{id} and type=0
and `group` = 2
and (username like "%"#{keyword}"%" or nickname like "%"#{keyword}"%")
select id from t_admin where nickname = #{nickname} order by id desc limit 1
select id from t_admin where username = #{username}
select menu_id from t_admin_permission where admin_id = #{admin_id}

select count(1) from t_admin where id != 1 and id!= #{id} and type=1
and nickname like "%"#{nickname}"%"
